com.example.volkerpetersen.sailingrace

Class start_raceActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.example.volkerpetersen.sailingrace.start_raceActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class start_raceActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    RaceActivity class to manage all screen updates, location updates, and computations during the race. This class supports race to Windward and Leeward marks (one each) and a manual wind mode (no Windex instrument) and a Windex instrument supported race mode

      • updateScreenNow

        java.lang.Runnable updateScreenNow
        Runnable to update the display every "screenUpdates" seconds. The screen update delay can be specified using the Setting parameter Screen Updates. Within this runnable we obtain the latest GPS position, perform all computations, and update the screen display with the results.

      • changeActivityOnSwipe

        public void changeActivityOnSwipe()
        changeActivityOnSwipe Method executes the desired action after the Class "swipeDetector" detected a left or right swipe. In this case we'll change to the MapsActivity on swipe detection

      • setWindwardMark

        public void setWindwardMark(boolean mapMarkerSet)
        Class methods to set the Windward mark at the current boat location. initiated by UI buttons defined in activity_start_race and the onClick listener in onCreate
        Parameters:
        mapMarkerSet - - boolean that is true when a position has been set. In that case this method will delete the existing mark

      • setLeewardMark

        public void setLeewardMark()
        Class methods to set the Leeward mark at the current boat location. initiated by UI buttons defined in activity_start_race and the onClick listener in onCreate

      • clearPositionMark

        public void clearPositionMark()
        The "clearPositionMark" method is called from the AlertDialog "alert" created in the onCreate method when user confirms the deletion of a current Windward or Leeward marker.
